Package org.apache.xpath.composite

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ForQuantifiedExprVarBinding
    An object of this class, is used to store information about XPath 3.1 "for" expression or "quantified expression" (i.e, 'some', 'every')'s single variable binding (i.e, run-time information details related to the grammar fragment "$" VarName "in" ExprSingle for a particular XPath "for" or "quantified expression" that's currently been evaluated).
    LetExprVarBinding
    An object of this class, is used to store information about XPath 3.1 "let" expression's single variable binding (i.e, run-time information details related to the grammar fragment "$" VarName ":=" ExprSingle for a particular XPath "let" expression that's currently been evaluated).
    SequenceTypeArrayTest
    An object of this class stores, an XSLT transformation run-time information for an occurrence of a XPath 3.1 sequence type ArrayTest.
    SequenceTypeData
    An object of this class, stores information about use of one sequence type XPath expression, while doing an XSLT stylesheet transformation.
    SequenceTypeFunctionTest
    An object of this class stores, an XSLT transformation run-time information for an occurrence of a XPath 3.1 sequence type FunctionTest.
    SequenceTypeKindTest
    An object of this class stores, an XPath run-time information for a sequence type kind test (for e.g, element(), element(elemName), attribute(), element(elemName, typeName)* etc.
    SequenceTypeMapTest
    An object of this class stores, an XSLT transformation run-time information for an occurrence of a XPath 3.1 sequence type MapTest.
    SequenceTypeSupport
    This class provides few utility methods, to support evaluation of XPath 3.1 sequence type expressions.
    SequenceTypeSupport.OccurrenceIndicator
    Sequence type occurrence indicator values, for Xalan-J implementation.
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType
    This class specifies min and max value ranges for XML Schema built-in types derived from type xs:integer, as defined by XML Schema specification.
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.Byte  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.Int  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.Long  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.NegativeInteger  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.NonNegativeInteger  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.NonPositiveInteger  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.PositiveInteger  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.Short  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.UnsignedByte  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.UnsignedInt  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.UnsignedLong  
    SequenceTypeSupport.XmlSchemaBuiltinNumericType.UnsignedShort  
    XPathArrayConstructor
    This class implements and evaluates XPath 3.1 literal array constructor expressions.
    XPathContextItemWithPredicate
    This class implements processing of XPath expression, with syntax .[predicate]
    XPathExprFunctionCallSuffix
    An XPath parser, constructs an object instance of this class to represent an XPath path expression with a function call suffix with form /temp/abc/func().
    XPathExprFunctionSuffix
    An object of this class, stores few run-time information for evaluation of XPath path expressions having function call suffix.
    XPathForExpr
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 'for' expression.
    XPathIfExpr
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 'if' expression.
    XPathLetExpr
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 'let' expression.
    XPathMapConstructor
    This class implements and evaluates XPath 3.1 map expressions.
    XPathNamedFunctionReference
    An XPath parser, constructs an object instance of this class to represent a named function reference expression.
    XPathQuantifiedExpr
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 quantified expressions 'some' & 'every'.
    XPathSequenceConstructor
    This class implements and evaluates XPath 3.1 literal sequence constructor expressions.
    XPathSequenceTypeExpr
    An object of this class is, populated by an XPath parser to represent a particular XPath sequence type expression.
